forgotPassword.messageErrorNoEmail: Your password can not be automatically reset because there is no email address associated with your account.

dashboardScreen.eventRedeemSubtitleCoin: You Completed the Promotion Event! Claim your Reward!

dashboardScreen.extraElementsBannerText:
Take your first step into an exciting, new adventure. 
Getting set up as easy as 1,2,3!

codeScreen.videoPlaceholderBottom: See if you can put what you learned into practice.
codeScreen.resetContent:
Are you sure you want to reset your code back to the exercise default? 
 You will lose the all changes you have made so far and this can not be undone.
codeScreen.videoPlaceholderBottom: Let's see how to use the basic mathematical operators! Complete each of the equations.

support.title: Support
support.waitingText:
Real Time Chat Support is available: 
 Monday to Friday 
 8:00am to 5:00pm 
(Atlantic Standard Time) 
 
 If you need additional support, please contact: 
 support@educode.ca
support.techLeftMessage: Tech user has left the chat

navDrawer.logoutAlertMessage: Are you sure that you want to logout?

subscription.step1Text: Learn to code from 810+ story-filled, cinematic tutorial videos!
subscription.step2Text: Interact with characters and write real code in gamified projects!
subscription.step3Text: Activate your code and bring your apps and games to life!
subscription.step4Text: Love us? Share us with our friends on social media!
subscription.superhero: BECOME A SUPERHERO IN THE WORLD OF PROGRAMMING!
subscription.access: Get unlimited access to all our immersive, gamified courses on coding & tech
subscription.terms1: * Payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase
subscription.terms1Android: * Payment will be charged to your Play Store account upon confirmation of purchase
subscription.terms2: * Subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period
subscription.terms3: * Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user Account Settings after purchase
subscription.terms5: * Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of renewal will be the same like when subscribed by first time.

common.passedText:
Your code has been validated and is correct!
You can now continue to the next exercise.

common.deselectAllCheck:

Click here to deselect all items.
